articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: The Kremlin says President Vladimir Putin has named Tax Service chief Mikhail Mishustin as Russia's new prime minister.
articles.description: The Kremlin says President Vladimir Putin has named Tax Service chief Mikhail Mishustin as Russia's new prime minister.
articles.content:
MOSCOW The Kremlin says President Vladimir Putin has named Tax Service chief Mikhail Mishustin as Russias new prime minister.

articles.title: Pro-Maduro forces attack opposition lawmakers as they attempt to enter Venezuela's National Assembly
articles.description: The violent confrontation, a week after Guaidó forced his way into the National Assembly, was in escalation in the year-long standoff between the Maduro government and the U.S.-backed opposition.

articles.description: Pol Lirola’s late goal gave 10-man Fiorentina a 2-1 win over Atalanta and a place in the Italian Cup quarterfinals
articles.content:

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Government backers block Venezuela legislative meeting
articles.description: Armed security forces and civilian motorcycle groups loyal to Venezuela's president have blocked opposition lawmakers from entering the National Assembly building to hold a session

The incident was part of a struggle for control of the opposition-controlled National Assembly and Venezuela as a whole, a nation suffering economic and social collapse.

articles.title: 100s of migrants gather in Honduras to attempt new caravan
articles.description: Hundreds of mainly Honduran migrants have started walking and hitching rides from the city of San Pedro Sula, in a bid to form the kind of migrant caravan that reached the U.S. border in 2018
articles.content:
Most attempts at forming caravans in 2019 were broken up by police and the national guard in Mexico, which has come under increased U.S. pressure to prevent migrants from arriving at the U.S. border.

articles.title: Lev Parnas reveals a new Ukraine quid pro quo
articles.description: New documents from Lev Parnas indicate this was perhaps less a matter of Yovanovitch standing in the way of Giuliani, and more of a favor to Ukraine to get the desired outcome.
